arggraph.edu: I live in Michigan, where we have a deposit.
I regularly see people bringing huge amounts of bottles and cans to grocery stores to recycle them.
While I do not have exact statistics on the topic,
this indicates to me that deposits promote recycling and should therefore be adopted.
This has also become a source of income for homeless people.
I see homeless people picking up littered cans so they can later recycle them for the deposit, which seems good to me.
